name: Monthly Report of Raw material, packaging & components
query:
select
sl.warehouse as "DIVISION::200",
sl.item_code as "ERP CODE::200",
i.item_name as "ITEM NAME::300",
i.stock_uom as "UNIT::100",
IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and month(sli.posting_date)< month(now()) order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1),0) as "OPENING STOCK::200",
IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and month(sli.posting_date)=month(now()) and year(sli.posting_date)=year(now()) order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1)-(select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and month(sli.posting_date)< month(now()) order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1),0) as "ISSUED THIS MONTH::200",
IFNULL((select sum(sli.actual_qty) from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and month(sli.posting_date) = month(now()) and year(sli.posting_date)=year(now()) and sli.actual_qty>=0 and sli.is_cancelled != 1  order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc ,sli.warehouse desc,sli.creation desc ),0) as "PURCHASED THIS MONTH::200",
((IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and month(sli.posting_date)< month(now()) order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1),0)-(IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and month(sli.posting_date)=month(now()) and year(sli.posting_date)=year(now()) order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1)-(select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and month(sli.posting_date)< month(now()) order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1),0)))+(IFNULL((select sum(sli.actual_qty) from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and month(sli.posting_date) = month(now()) and year(sli.posting_date)=year(now()) and sli.actual_qty>=0 and sli.is_cancelled != 1  order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc ,sli.warehouse desc,sli.creation desc ),0)))as "CLOSING STOCK::200",
IFNULL((select sli.valuation_rate from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and month(sli.posting_date)< month(now()) order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1),0) as "value per Pcs/Kg::100",
IFNULL(((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and month(sli.posting_date)=month(now()) and year(sli.posting_date)=year(now()) order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1)-(select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and month(sli.posting_date)< month(now()) order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1))*(select sli.valuation_rate from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and month(sli.posting_date)< month(now()) order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1),0) as "Month Consumption in birr::100"
from `tabItem` i join `tabStock Ledger Entry` sl
where sl.item_code=i.item_code and sl.item_code LIKE "RM%%" and sl.company="Ethal 2021"
group by sl.warehouse,sl.item_code,i.item_name
order by sl.item_code,sl.creation desc,sl.warehouse desc,sl.posting_date desc, sl.posting_time desc;
report_name: Monthly Report of Raw material, packaging & components
